short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A button to close all tabs from the current website

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension adds a button to the same area as the favorites icon. When pressed, it closes the tab along with all other tabs from the same site in the window. Useful as a quick way to clean up tabs when you have too many open. See also the Tabbex Match extension which is a complementary way to close tabs.
